Package util

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
util.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
Add_Album, Add_Photo, Add_Tag, Add_User, AlbumsController, Copy_Photo, Edit_Album, Edit_Caption, LoginController, Manage_Users, Move_Photo, PhotosController, Search_Photo
public class Controller extends Object
Class Representation of a Controller object This class serves as the base controller for the JavaFX application. It provides methods for initializing stages, displaying error dialogs, and closing windows. Additionally, it holds references to the primary stage, current user, and an ArrayList of photos.
Author:
xxxx, yyyy

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage)
      Initializes controller's private fields and sets up controller for stage.
      Parameters:
      mainStage - the Stage that this controller controls

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, User user, ArrayList<Photo> photoList)
      Initializes controller's private fields and sets up controller for stage. Additionally, it accepts an ArrayList of photos that will be used to populate an added Album.
      Parameters:
      mainStage - the Stage that this controller controls
      user - the current User that's accessing this stage
      photoList - the ArrayList of Photos passed through this controller that will be used to populate the added Album
